project.teaser: Cities are under increasing pressure from rapid urbanization, rising mobility and energy demands, and the need for climate-neutral solutions to efficiently design and manage urban space. COREspaces will transform urban spaces by addressing critical challenges related to space...
project.objective: Cities are under increasing pressure from rapid urbanization, rising mobility and energy demands, and the need for climate-neutral solutions to efficiently design and manage urban space. COREspaces will transform urban spaces by addressing critical challenges related to space scarcity, mobility and energy efficiency and sustainability. It integrates advanced digital tools (e.g. AI-assisted planning, Digital Twins) to enable cities to manage urban space, optimize mobility infrastructure, increase energy efficiency and enhance urban resilience. The project’s emphasis on citizens’ engagement and inclusive decision-making, leading to equitable and liveable urban environments while contributing to climate-neutral urban spaces, aligning with EU sustainability goals. Based on vast pre-existing mobility and energy innovations specialized in citizens driven co-creation and urban space design, the project introduces COREInnovations, a set of adaptable digital and physical tools that integrate AI, DTs, and participatory planning to optimize urban space use and support climate neutrality. Real-world demonstrations hosted in Living Lab from 9 European cities will pave the way towards data-driven and human-centric urban transformation. The project fosters cross-sectorial collaboration between cities, public authorities, citizens, academy and industry partners to ensure evidence-based decision-making for sustainable urban transitions, aligned with the EU Green Deal and Climate Neutrality goals of cities while supporting the objectives of the Work Programme. The project addresses challenges by developing practical methodologies and robust solutions and governance frameworks to speed up decision making; innovative strategies for urban space reallocation and dynamic curbside management; and financial mechanisms, guidelines & blueprints to secure replicability and to enable “future ready”, CO2 neutral and climate resilient symbiotic urban spaces for the cognitive cities of Europe.
project.title: COdesign urban REalm & dynamic Spaces management for cognitive & socially connected cities
project.keywords: cognitive cities, urban space design, curb-side management

category.title: Project

category.title: Digital agenda
category.description: This tracker monitors Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the development of digital technologies and the digitisation of the economy and society (known as ‘Digital transition’).

category.title: Clean air
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the clean air policy (National Emission Ceiling Directive) aiming to improve ambient air quality and tackle air pollution, to protect the environment and human health.

category.title: Artificial intelligence
category.description: This tracker monitors Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the development and deployment of AI-based technologies and solutions. Projects that develop AI-tools as part of their research method are included

category.title: Climate action
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to both mitigating climate change (e.g., contributions to the reduction of greenhouse gas emissions) and adapting to climate change by building resilience (e.g., regarding floods, droughts, spatial planning and better governance, adaptation to changing climate in value chains, etc.).

category.title: Biodiversity
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to Europe’s biodiversity’s path to recovery including species protection, ecosystem conservation, and habitat rehabilitation, all essential for resilience in climate adaptation and addressing ecosystem services but also environmental crime and the health-environment connection.

category.title: HORIZON Innovation Actions
category.description: HORIZON Innovation Actions

category.description: RTD research data warehouse
